```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)

# Useful codes 
leer_happiness <- function(file, year) {
  
  df <- read_csv(file) |>
    clean_names()
  
  # Renombrar country_or_region → country SOLO si existe
  if ("country_or_region" %in% names(df)) {
    df <- df |> rename(country = country_or_region)
  }
  df <- df |> mutate(year = year)
  df
}

h15 <- leer_happiness("data/2015.csv", 2015)
h16 <- leer_happiness("data/2016.csv", 2016)
h17 <- leer_happiness("data/2017.csv", 2017)
h18 <- leer_happiness("data/2018.csv", 2018)
h19 <- leer_happiness("data/2019.csv", 2019)
```
